fallback: We cannot do that right now
intro0: Hey, I’m Ben!  What’s your name?
intro1: Glad you’ve come over! I love playdates! And today, I’ve got something so cool, so different for us to do. Would you like to follow me?
failurePhrase: You lose current round. Would you like to try again or start new mission?
wonPhrase: You won current round. Would you like to try again or start new mission?
sushiSliceDemoPhrase5: Now it’s your turn, Ben’s friend.
sushiSliceIntroPhrase0: Hi, Sensei Sushi! This is my friend USERNAME_PLACEHOLDER. We can’t wait to start.<break time="2s"/>
sushiSliceIntroPhrase1: Nice to meet you, Ben’s friend! You came just in time. Adachi, my new samurai worker know how to slice and chop.  But that all he know.  He must be told exactly what to do and then he do it! But I am busy with customers and cannot stand here the whole time and tell him what to do. Dohh-shee-yohh
sushiSliceIntroPhrase2: We are here to help, Sensei. I will take out the food, and my friend USERNAME_PLACEHOLDER will tell Adachi what to do.<break time="2s"/>
sushiSliceIntroPhrase3: That is a good idea, Ben.  You take out the food and I will show your friend how to instruct Adachi.<break time="2s"/>
sushiSliceIntroPhrase4: If Ben give you fish, say "Slice!" If it's a vegetable,  say "Chop!". If it’s rice, say "Boil".  And if it’s seaseed, say "Roll!".  And if he accidentally throw you not food, say "No!".<break time="2s"/>
sushiSliceIntroPhrase5: Sensei will show you now.<break time="2s"/>
